<div style="text-align: center;">
  <h1>Welcome to TraitBlender</h1>
</div>

TraitBlender is an open-source pipeline for simulating image datasets of synthetic organisms from theoretical morphospaces. It is implemented as an addon to [Blender](https://www.blender.org/about/), an open-source 3D modeling suite used for artistic and scientific purposes.
